title: Pig Iron Production for Germany
notes:
Luxembourg Is Included Throughout; Alsace-Lorraine, Beginning 1871. Data From 1869-1909 Are Official Figures Published By The Source; Thereafter Data Are The Source'S. Source: Verien Deutscher Eisen Und Stahl Industrieller, "Deutschlands Gewinnung An Roheisen Rohstahl Und Walzwerko-Erzengnissan", 1933, Pp. 28-29.

This NBER data series a01215 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.
